recipesJson.name: Taruto by Yami Vapor #REMIXMONTH
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is a Portugese Egg Tart remix of Taruto by Yami vapor
Made on "Live Mixing: Taruto"
http://diyordievaping.com/livemixing

reviews.text: Very tasty, its the first time I have usd Rf Shortbread Cookie and works very well in this mix. I really like the low amount of bananas foster for just a touch of that brown sugar note.
enjoyable vape, definitely hit the profile.  many thanks.
